summary:
The Airbus A320 family is a group of popular passenger airplanes made by Airbus. The first one flew in 1987 and entered service in 1988. There are different sizes: A318, A319, A320, and A321, carrying between 107 and 230 passengers. They are known for their digital flight controls and efficient engines.

The A320neo, with even better fuel economy, joined the family in 2016. American Airlines has the most A320s, and IndiGo has ordered the most. Over 18,000 A320s have been ordered, making it the best-selling airliner, surpassing the Boeing 737.
title: Airbus A320 family
